comments.author: Christian Trutz
comments.body: A little patch for jackrabbit-api (trunk) containing serialVersionUID for AuthorizableExistsException and NoSuchPrincipalException.

comments.author: Jukka Zitting
comments.body: The NoSuchPrincipalException no longer exists, but I added the serialVersionUID field to AuthorizableExistException as proposed in revision 889556.
